description:
This course will teach students how to perform a perfect, consistent American accent through the application of ten simple rules. A variety of different teaching mediums are used (audio-visual lectures, text, quiz) to facilitate learning in an interesting and interactive way.

This course was designed for actors and voice artists, and can be used by anyone who wants to be able to achieve a flawless standard American accent.

Within the course, each accent rule (as well as the introduction and conclusion) is presented as a separate lecture. The slides used within each video lecture are downloadable as resource material supplementing the introductory lecture. The vocal warmup and the tips for marking a script in the American accent are presented as downloadable text files. Finally, there is a quiz to test progress and understanding of the concepts.
title: How to do a Flawless American Accent
